subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mike Napoli hit a three-run double in a seven-run second inning as the Red Sox, playing with heavy hearts one day after deadly bombings back home, beat the Cleveland Indians, 7-2.
snippet: Mike Napoli hit a three-run double in a seven-run second inning as the Red Sox, playing with heavy hearts one day after deadly bombings back home, beat the Cleveland Indians, 7-2.
